name: Fae
desc: Followers of the first Cryo Archon, the Belyi Tsar, who were created from the bones of giant beasts and fallen frostmoon light.

customize.name: Angels
customize.desc: Also known as Heavenly envoys, their primary duties were to help people. They were later expelled from Celestia and consequently lost their bodies and minds.

customize.text: When the first angel went against the rules established by the Heavenly Principles, she handed over the power of creation, which belonged to the Primordial One, to mortals. In the deep galleries, the masters forged countless fae in the hope that one day, these little creatures might create a perfect being that could merge with the world.

customize.name: Primordial One
customize.desc: The First Descender, who defeated seven Dragon Sovereigns of the world and created people. The Primordial One may be Phanes.

customize.text: Primordial One threw the divine nails, and the fae shrieked as they turned into icy silver mist.

customize.name: Belyi Tsar
customize.desc: Tsar of all fae and the first Cryo Archon.

customize.text:
The remaining fae followed the first Cryo Archon and began ruling the north.
Snezhnaya
The fae are the nobility of Snezhnaya. Although their glory is in the past, they continue to influence the nation.

customize.name: Flins
customize.desc: A Lightkeeper of Nod-Krai, guardian of a lighthouse and graveyard on a northern isle. An enigmatic gentleman, cultured and courtly.

customize.text:
The Lantern Fae and the Ratnik of Nod-Krai. He's believed to have performed many good deeds for Nod-Krai. When a devastating Abyssal calamity swept across Nod-Krai, heartbroken by what had become of the land they had so cherished, that Fae extinguished his light, just as the Abyss had extinguished all hope.
There is a belief among the Lightkeepers: if you encounter the Wild Hunt, a blue lantern will appear, which you must follow.
Preobrazhensky
A Fatui professor who studied the Abyssal influence on kuuvahki. Because of this research, the whole team dies, and an anomaly appeared in Nod-Krai.
Nashchokin
A thief known as Vagabond. Together with Schanzkowska and a hunter, he joined the "Godfather."
